msbt.message: When I go bug catching, I'm very mindful to only catch them temporarily.Even if I scare them away, I find it so moving to watch them fly off into the vast blue sky.

Ohhhh, this is so frustrating! I can't believe what's happened! Oh, well. There are other fish in the sea. Huh? A broken heart? No, no, no! I was literally talking about fishing. ThoughI see how I confused you. I guess maybe the struggles of love and fishing aren't so different!

Strolling around the island with a watering can and watering the plants is a big part of my daily routine.When I take care of them every day, I feel love welling up in my heart.Maybe it's my maternal instinct? I even give them secret little names. "Plantina" is my favorite.

In a certain sense, an umbrella expresses its owner's personality even more than clothes. After all, clothes can look good or look bad on somebody, so shopping involves a lot of deliberation, no?But you only use umbrellas now and then, so you can just buy a design you like without thinking too hard.
